SEARCH
Package players

Class NetworkPlayer

java.lang.Object
players.HumanPlayer
players.NetworkPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Player
public class NetworkPlayer extends HumanPlayer
This class represents a player in a networked chess game. It extends the HumanPlayer class and inherits its functionality. This class can be used to handle player interactions in a networked environment.
See Also:

    • getPromotionPiece

      public Piece getPromotionPiece(Chessboard chessboard)
      Retrieves the piece chosen for promotion by the network player. This method always returns null since network players don't choose promotion pieces.
      Specified by:
      getPromotionPiece in interface Player
      Overrides:
      getPromotionPiece in class HumanPlayer
      Parameters:
      chessboard - the current state of the chessboard (not used for network players)
      Returns:
      returns which piece is chosen
